East Carolina Universitys baseball team   American Athletic Conference will play the University of Cincinnati   AAC in a weekend series at ClarkLeClair Stadium in Greenville North Carolina from April  to April  PERIOD

The Pirates also faced another opponent at home prior to this series with a nonconference midweek game on April  against Old Dominion University   Sun Belt Conference at  p.m PERIOD

In their most recent weekend series the Pirates swept the University of Central Florida UCF   AAC PERIOD They won convincingly scoring  runs in three games compared to  for UCF PERIOD

ECU has now improved their home record to  before their matchup against Old Dominion PERIOD They recorded a series sweep of UCF for the secondstraight season and has won  of the last  meetings PERIOD

This was the Pirates first clean sweep of the season against AAC opponents since they had previously dropped their first conference series of the season against the University of Houston   AAC PERIOD But with the sweep of UCF the Pirates completed their fifth weekend series sweep of the season PERIOD

Last season the Pirates and Bearcats met seven times with the Pirates winning six of them PERIOD They competed in two weekend series as well as the AAC playoffs PERIOD

In the previous season ECU lost the first game they played in Cincinnati but they won the next two games and the series overall PERIOD Following that the Bearcats arrived at ClarkLeClair Stadium and lost three straight games giving the Pirates the series sweep PERIOD

When the two teams played in the conference playoffs ECU triumphed in seven innings using a mercy rule winning  and advancing to face Tulane University PERIOD

The Pirates have a long relationship with the Bearcats dating back to  when the teams first met PERIOD The entire record of these two teams against each other is  with ECU winning  of their meetings PERIOD

One of ECUs most explosive games versus Cincinnati was on April   when the Pirates scored  runs PERIOD The final score ended up being  PERIOD

Back in  the Pirates began a 10game winning streak over the Bearcats that would last until  PERIOD That streak would come to an end on May   during the second game of a double header PERIOD

When comparing ECUs home and away records against Cincinnati the Pirates have three losses in both situations PERIOD ECU is  when Cincinnati visits Greenville and they are  when they travel to Cincinnati PERIOD

After this weekend series the Pirates eight game home stand will end and they will travel to Charlotte North Carolina to play University of North Carolina at Charlotte   Conference USA on April  at  p.m PERIOD at Truist Field PERIOD
